availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Martha "Patsy" Froggett Boston in Barren County, Kentucky, in September 1832. Father of Nancy J. Boston, George B. Boston, Sarah C. Boston, Mary F. Boston, Abner Boston, Amanda Boston, William Boston, and Zuinglius Boston. Married to Francis Forbis Sandidge Boston in Green County on September 26, 1862. Father of Idora Boston. Stepfather of James Sandidge and Rachel Sandidge. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.
